Html: Has anyone tried PHPExcel inside of a CakePHP website?

The Bakery has some helper classes for reading and writing with PHPExcel within CakePHP http://bakery.cakephp.org/articles/melgior/2010/01/26/simple-excel-spreadsheet-helper and http://bakery.cakephp.org/articles/segy/2012/04/02/phpexcel_helper_for_generating_excel_files that might provide some help
